story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: ANTRED was founded by the family of Tiphaine Véron. This French tourist disappeared at the age of 36 during a trip to Japan in July 2018. From the beginning, Tiphaine's family has been striving to uncover the truth 'on the other side of the world,' both in Japan and in France, where the case narrowly avoided being closed without resolution. An investigation is currently being conducted by the Cold Case Unit in Nanterre for 'kidnapping and detention,' and the UN Committee on Enforced Disappearances is mobilized to seek answers from Japanese authorities.
story.paragraph2: In 2024, to alleviate the suffering of families going through a similar ordeal and to prevent them from facing a disappearance abroad alone, Tiphaine’s relatives decided to establish a public-interest association.
story.paragraph3: The finding was clear: a legal battle is a challenge in itself, and the international dimension adds pain upon pain. Until now, in France, no association, foundation, or support network was equipped to address such a situation.
story.paragraph4: ANTRED aims to fill this gap by providing any useful resources to French nationals facing a disappearance abroad and outside the mainland. Sharing experiences and connecting families with qualified experts, publishing alerts and announcements on social networks, tools to raise funds, guidance to publicize a case, psychological support… ANTRED’s missions are diverse, dedicated to families in search of truth.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: ANTRED's mission is to assist French nationals who are victims of troubling disappearances (accident, abduction, homicide, incarceration…) abroad and outside the mainland.
mission.paragraph2: The association brings together those who wish to contribute their skills and resources to support these families’ efforts. This assistance takes various forms according to the needs of the families involved.

examples.professionalConnections: Connections with professionals (lawyers, translators, interpreters, investigators, dog handlers, scientists…)
examples.socialMedia: Broadcasting search notices on social networks
examples.supportOnLocation: Support during appointments, or on-site if necessary

mission.paragraph3: For any other form of assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. ANTRED will adapt as much as possible to your needs.

disappearance.title: A Solidarity Network to Give More Chances to Searches.
disappearance.subtitle: Each search notice is a hope for families facing the disappearance of a loved one far from home. This page groups these notices to raise awareness and mobilize each of us. By sharing these alerts, you directly contribute to the searches and support for families in this ordeal. Together, let's do everything possible to bring these people back to those who are waiting for them. To go further, a donation can help finance the searches and support families in their quest for truth.

helpUs.description: Thanks to your help, ANTRED can fund concrete actions: disseminating search notices, providing legal support, and logistical support on the ground. With you, we can offer more hope to families in waiting.
